rules_text:
Menace
Whenever you sacrifice a non-Goblin, permanent, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grom’s Spaghetti: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Grom’s Spaghetti, you may exile it. If you do, return to your hand all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn.
notes:
Added art, added flavor text
